title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti until al dente.
Meanwhile, fry pancetta in a pan until crispy. Remove from heat.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated cheese together with lots of black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup pasta water, then drain spaghetti.
Add hot spaghetti to the pancetta pan (off heat), toss quickly.
Pour egg mixture over pasta and toss vigorously. Add pasta water if needed for creaminess.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.
